channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- PR100088 Modbus gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- PR100088 Modbus gateway

item.title: CVE-2019-6527|2024-09-17T02:32:35.184Z -- ics-cert -- pr100088%20modbus%20gateway
item.description: PR100088 Modbus gateway versions prior to Release R02 (or Software Version 1.1.13166) may allow an attacker to be able to change the password for an admin user who is currently or previously logged in, provided the device has not been restarted.
